meanings.definition: The way in which something is composed or arranged.
meanings.sent1: The makeup of the team includes players of different skills and strengths.
meanings.sent2: She carefully considered the makeup of the jigsaw puzzle before starting.
meanings.sent3: The makeup of the sandwich was so perfect that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The makeup of the forest was a beautiful blend of tall trees and colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The makeup of the music band was a harmonious mix of vocals and instruments.

meanings.definition: Cosmetics applied to the face to enhance or alter appearance.
meanings.sent1: She used makeup to highlight her eyes and cheeks for the party.
meanings.sent2: The makeup artist skillfully applied makeup to the model for the photoshoot.
meanings.sent3: The clown's makeup was so exaggerated that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her makeup was like a mask, hiding her true emotions from others.
meanings.sent5: The makeup she wore transformed her into a glamorous movie star.

meanings.definition: The combination of qualities that form a person's character.
meanings.sent1: His makeup as a leader included honesty, integrity, and empathy.
meanings.sent2: The makeup of her personality was a mix of kindness and determination.
meanings.sent3: The makeup of his character was so unique that everyone admired him.
meanings.sent4: Her makeup as a friend was like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The makeup of his character shone brightly in times of adversity.
